data.message: My Facebook page (not personal profile) was hijacked by spammers over the summer and this problem STILL hasn't been resolved. Pictures of myself, my husband, and my kids are on that page, along with my work email which is being flooded with harassing and threatening messages now. I would like to either be able to regain control of the page that I maintained for my business for years, or I would like it removed so that I am no longer associated with the spam that is being posted every couple minutes and people no longer have access to my email address. This has gone on too long Facebook.

replies.message:
We're sorry to hear about this, Ashleigh! It's possible that your account or the account of someone who works on your Page was hacked. To learn more about how to secure accounts, please visit our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1D29Ghe. 

If you wish to remove your Page altogether, you can follow these steps: http://on.fb.me/1BXAIT6. We hope this helps improve your experience on Facebook! -Rose

We understand your concern, Iman. For most groups, only your friends can add you to groups and you can leave a group at any time. To learn more, please visit our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1CyG1h1. In the meantime, we will pass your feedback on to our team! -Rose
